name: Feature Request
about: Suggest a new analysis or visualization
title: "[FEATURE] "
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''
---

## Description
Describe the analysis or visualization you'd like to see.

## Problem Statement
What question would this analysis answer?

## Proposed Solution
Describe how you'd like this feature to work.

## Data Required
What data fields are needed for this analysis?

## Expected Outcome
Describe the expected output (chart, statistics, insights).

## Use Cases
When and why would this analysis be useful?

## Additional Context
Add mockups, references, or examples here.
